mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` (user_id, order_way, order_address, order_create_time, order_json_body, order_get_numb, order_state, order_note, order_should_pay, order_real_pay) VALUES (#{userId}, #{orderWay}, #{orderAddress}, #{orderCreateTime}, #{orderJsonBody}, #{orderGetNumb}, #{orderState}, #{orderNote}, #{orderShouldPay}, #{orderRealPay})
mapper.select: SELECT order_id, user_id, order_way, order_address, order_create_time, order_json_body, order_get_numb, order_state, order_note, order_should_pay, order_real_pay FROM `order` WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND user_id = #{userId}
